# nb-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | 是否默认选中      | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `color`    | `color`    | 开关背景颜色      | `string`  | `'#4C98FC'` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | 是否不可修改      | `boolean` | `false`     |


## Events

| Event    | Description | Type                |
| -------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
| `change` | 当状态发生改变     | `CustomEvent<void>` |
